item.title: Contents
item.description: The Worldly Azhvars – volulme 1 Nālāyira Divya Prabhandam - first thousand pāsurams Periyazhvar Thiruppallaṇḍu & Thirumozhi (1- 473) Aṇḍal.: Thiruppāvai (474 -503) Aṇḍal.: Nāchiyār Thirumozhi (504-646) Perumāl Thirumozhi by Kulasekharazhvar (647 -751) Thirumazhisai Azhvar. Thiruchanda Virutham (752 -871) Thirumālai : Thoṇḍaraḍippoḍi Azhvar (872-916) Thiruppaḷḷi Ezhuchi - Thoṇḍaraḍippoḍi Azhvar (917-926) Amalan Aadipirān. - Thiruppāṇāzhvār (927-936) Kaṇṇiṇuṭchiṛuthāmbu. Madhurakavi Azhvar (937-947) Paśurams by Seven Azhvārs, Part 2 (pāsurams 948-2081) The Worldly Azhvars – volulme 2 contents

item.title: Intr
item.description: Nālāyira Divya Prabhandam Paśurams by Seven Azhvārs, Part 1 (pāsurams 1-947) English Translation by Kausalya Hart Emeritus Professor, University of California, Berkeley, California. USA THE WORLDLY AZHVARS Divyaprabandham - Seven Azhvars You are the sweetness in milk. You are the brightness of precious gold. You are the freshness of green moss. You have the dark color of bees that drink honey and fly around the ponds. You are the four seasons.
